content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0, 0) with coal as fuel.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(41, -82)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (41, -82) with coal as fuel.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients for an item are available in the inventory before attempting to craft the item.
- Check the recipe for the item to determine the required sub-ingredients and their quantities.

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Make sure to have the required item in the inventory before attempting to place an entity.
- Check the inventory to ensure that the required item is available before placing an entity.

### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure that the position where the entity is to be placed is not occupied by another entity.
- Check the position before attempting to place an entity to avoid errors.

### Errors when extracting or placing items without proper setup
- Ensure that the entity is properly set up and has the required items or space before attempting to extract or place items.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to determine if there are any issues that need to be addressed before extracting or placing items.
